title: EEE in Ring road or ECE in Elcetronic city campus?
content:
Hey pesians 
Can I know how is EEE branch in pes ring road ,is it good even placement wise 
And which will be a better choice if one is both skill and placement oriented 
Will I get equal internship opportunities in these both

comments.body:
Ring road campus is easy to reach 
But ec campus is too far ,I'll opt for hostel if chosen ec campus
He commented so that more people see your post (i.e. "for reach" ), he didn't mean anything.
placements gets pooled, go with the branch of your choice
ECE in EC campus. Close your eyes and take it
Also I'd suggest you give priority to branch over campus since placements are held together for both now.
Just go for ECE in E-city campus because if you wanna upgrade to CSE later you can easily do that without going through much change because usually Cgpa cutoffs are pretty low for EC campus CSE.
